document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the euryglossiform species of the Afrotropical bee genus Scrapter Lepeletier & Serville, 1828 (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the euryglossiform species of the Afrotropical bee genus Scrapter Lepeletier & Serville, 1828 (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae)

figureCitation.captionText-0: Fig. 30. Scrapter spinipes sp. nov., ♀. A. Lateral view. B. Head (SEM). C. Thorax (dorsal view). D. Thorax (dorsal view, SEM). E. Metasoma (dorsal view). Scale bars: photos: 1 mm, SEM: 0.1 mm.
figureCitation.captionText-1: Fig. 31. Scrapter spinipes sp. nov., ♂. A. Lateral view. B. Genitalia (dorsal view, SEM). C. Metasoma (dorsal view). D. S7 (dorsal view, SEM). E. Hind tibia. F. S8, apical end (SEM). Scale bars: photos: 1 mm, SEM: 0.1 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph: Named for the conspicuous apicolateral spine of the male hind tibia.
Type material ( 63 specimens examined)

materialsCitation.paragraph:
SOUTH AFRICA : ♂ ,
12 km NW of Nieuwoudtville
, Farm Avontuur , Fynbos ,
770 m
, 31°16'18" S , 19°02'55" E ,
18 Aug. 2012
, M. Kuhlmann ( SANC ).

subSubSection.paragraph: SOUTH AFRICA : 1 ♀ , 4 ♂♂ , same data as holotype (SANC 2 ♂♂ , RCMK 1 ♀ , 2 ♂♂ ); 8 ♂♂ , idem, 3 Sep. 2012 , MK (RCMK); 1 ♀ , 1 ♂ , Ouberg Pass, 27 km SE of Vanrhynsdorp, Fynbos, 380 m , 31°48'07" S , 18°55'00" E , 9 Aug. 2011 , MK (RCMK); 13 ♂♂ , idem, 8 Aug. 2012 , MK (NHML 9 ♂♂ , RCMK 4 ♂♂ ); 1 ♀ , 1 ♂ , idem, 13 Aug. 2012 , MK (RCMK); 2 ♀♀ , 7 ♂♂ , idem, 23 Aug. 2012 , MK (NHML 5 ♂♂ , RCMK 2 ♀♀ , 2 ♂♂ ), 6 ♀♀ , 17 ♂♂ , idem, 30 Aug. 2012 , MK (SANC 2 ♀♀ , 2 ♂♂ , NHML 2 ♀♀ , 11 ♂♂ , RCMK 2 ♀♀ , 4 ♂♂ ).
BODY LENGTH. 4.8–5.1 mm .
WINGS. Slightly yellowish-brown; wing venation and stigma brown.
LEGS. Integument black to dark reddish-brown; fore tibia basally partly with small yellowish spot. Vestiture greyish-white, scopa greyish-white, dorsally slightly brownish.

caption.paragraph:
Fig. 30.
Scrapter spinipes
sp. nov. , ♀. A . Lateral view. B . Head (SEM). C . Thorax (dorsal view). D . Thorax (dorsal view, SEM). E . Metasoma (dorsal view). Scale bars: photos: 1 mm, SEM: 0.1 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph: BODY LENGTH. 4.8–5.1 mm .

caption.paragraph:
Fig. 31.
Scrapter spinipes
sp. nov. , ♂. A . Lateral view. B . Genitalia (dorsal view, SEM). C . Metasoma (dorsal view). D . S7 (dorsal view, SEM). E . Hind tibia. F . S8, apical end (SEM). Scale bars: photos: 1 mm, SEM: 0.1 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph: WINGS. Slightly yellowish-brown; wing venation and stigma brown.
The species has only been found on sandy soils in Fynbos of the wider Nieuwoudtville area.

Brassicaceae :
Heliophila
sp., with a strong preference for blue-flowering species.
August–September.
